section.heading: Rules and procedures.
section.text: The Mayor, in consultation with WASA, is authorized to promulgate rules and to establish procedures to implement this chapter.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 6016 of Fiscal Year 2005 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-486, August 2, 2004, 51 DCR 8236).
